title.en: My Female Disciples are all Future Masters of the Heavens

altTitles.en: My Female Apprentices Are All Big Shots From the Future

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ De Nǚ Túdìmen Dōu Shì Wèilái Zhū Tiān Dà Lǎo

altTitles.zh: 我的女徒弟们都是未来诸天大佬

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Nü Tudi Men Dou Shi Weilai Zhu Tian Dalao

altTitles.zh-hk: 諸天聖者〜崩壊世界と女弟子〜

altTitles.tr: Kadın Çıraklarımın Hepsi Gelecekteki Büyük Tanrılar

altTitles.en: My Female Apprentices Are All Big Ss From the Future

altTitles.vi: Các Nữ Đồ Đệ Của Ta Đều Là Chư Thiên Đại Lão Tương Lai

altTitles.es-la: Mis discípulas son las futuros grandezas de los cielos

description.en:
The historical timeline is facing collapse, and the strongest Taoist master was sent back to one hundred thousand years ago with his entire body of cultivation. Ding~ Your system-assigned mission is here, it's up to you to entice all the female apprentices!


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (KuaiKan)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/13619)
- [Official japanese (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82263)
description.tr: Tarihin uzun nehri çöküşle karşı karşıya, en güçlü Taoist rahip yüz bin yıl önceye geri döndü. Ding ~ Sistem görev verdi ve gelecekteki tanrıları çırağınız yapın!
description.zh: 历史长河面临崩溃，最强道尊带着一身修为回到十万年前？叮~您的系统任务到了，收服女徒弟的任务就交给你了！

altTitles.tr: Cross-dressing yaparken, yakışıklı bir adam beni yürüttü

altTitles.ru: Пока я был переодет в женскую одежду, ко мне пристал красивый парень!

altTitles.zh: 女装上街闲逛被帅哥搭讪了

altTitles.ja: イケメン女子と女装男子

altTitles.en: While Cross-Dressing, I Was Hit on by a Handsome Guy!

altTitles.ja-ro: Josou Shite Machi ni Kuridashitara Ikemen ni Nanpa Sareru Manga

description.en: While cross-dressing, I was hit on by a handsome guy, except she wasn't actually a handsome guy!
description.tr: Ceza olarak crossdressing yaparken yakışıklı bir adamla karşılaştım ve işi pişirdi.
description.pt-br: Por causa de uma brincadeira eu acabei tendo de me vestir de menina, então, sai às ruas, e nesse dia, acabei conhecendo alguém e minha vida está para mudar.

title.en: I Got The Weakest Class, Dragon Tamer!?

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：驭龙师是最弱职业？

altTitles.zh-ro: Quánmín Zhuǎn Zhí: Yù Lóng Shī Shì Zuì Ruò Zhíyè?

description.en: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

altTitles.ja: アンビバレント～童貞を捨てたら死ぬ世界～

altTitles.en: Ambivalent: A World Where Losing Your Virginity Means Death

description.en: A new type of sexually transmitted infection is spreading around the world. When infected, women's sexual desire increases by several dozen times, while 99% of men die. In a world where casual sex means death, Shindo Sadao, who is a virgin, vows not to have relations with anyone until a vaccine is developed, but the temptations of women overwhelm him!
description.ja: 新種の性感染症が世界中で流行。感染すると女性は性欲が数十倍に、男性は99%が死亡する。「安易な性行為=死」となった世界。性経験のない主人公・神童貞雄は、ワクチンが開発されるまで、誰とも関係を持たないことを誓うが、女性たちの誘惑が彼を襲いーー!?

altTitles.ja: SERVAMP-サーヴァンプ-

altTitles.th: เซอร์แวมพ์

description.en: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
description.ja: 高校１年生・城田真昼が道ばたで拾った一匹の可愛い黒猫・クロの正体は、「サーヴァンプ」という下僕の吸血鬼。しかも性格は超ひきこもりニート系。契約によってクロの主人となった真昼は、吸血鬼同士の争いに巻き込まれ戦うはめになるのだが……？

title.en: After 100,000 Years of Training in a Super Difficult Dungeon, I Became the World's Strongest ~The Weakest Incompetent Gains the Upper Hand~

altTitles.ja: 超難関ダンジョンで10万年修行した結果、世界最強に ～最弱無能の下剋上～

description.en: "The most incompetent person in the world ". Kai Heinemann received this gift at the age of 13. The effects of the gift resulted in Kai's significantly reduced physical abilities, and he became despised and bullied in the gifted supremacy of Lamour. Kai is forced to leave his home and is attacked on his way to the royal capital, and while desperately running away, he wanders into a dungeon. In the dungeon, he had to clear the "Trial of the Gods" to get out, and the time did not progress. Kai, feeling like he was going to die, spent 100,000 years clearing the dungeon. In the process of clearing the trial of the gods, Kai becomes the most powerful being in the world, gaining unique and strong friends along the way.
description.ja: 【この世で一番の無能】・・・13歳でこのギフトを得たカイ・ハイネマンは、ギフトの効果で身体能力が著しく低くなる。周囲からのいじめにより国を去ることになったカイは、旅の途中で「神々の試練」を与えるダンジョンに迷い込んでしまい――？

altTitles.ja: 獣王と薬草

description.en: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

altTitles.ja: 東京エイリアンズ

description.en: Gunji Akira, who has just started high school, has been chasing after his father's ghost by trying to become a police officer just like him. One day however, he has a surprise encounter with an alien while leaving school. And there begins the start of his fateful adventures with extraterrestrial life…
description.vi: Một ngày đẹp trời, Gunji Akira, một học sinh trung học bình thường đã đặt chân lên toa tàu định mệnh; và từ đó, cuộc đời cậu đã thay đổi hoàn toàn. Câu chuyện gay lọ à nhầm gay cấn đã bắt đầu~

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

altTitles.ja: 卒業アルバムの彼女たち

altTitles.en: The Heroines in my Graduation Albums

description.en:
"A love that was supposed to be just a memory starts moving all at once!!"
Kanae Meguru, a movie enthusiast, had potential romantic interests throughout elementary, middle, and high school. However, due to his lack of experience in love, he was never able to take action. Learning from that, he vowed to focus entirely on his university film club activities, completely ignoring romance.
But that resolve was short-lived—before he knew it, he found himself falling for Ootsuka Ozora, a girl he met in the film club...!?
A romantic comedy where all the love flags get collected—let the story begin!

altTitles.ja: 破滅の恋人

description.en:
Is the woman a ghost or a witch?
A chance encounter between a girl and a beautiful, but not ghostly, girl who lives in a haunted house like a secret base.

altTitles.ja: 時森さんが無防備です!!

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！
description.pt-br: Tokimori-san é uma mulher linda e bem-sucedida. Mas quando ela está fora do trabalho, ela tende a ficar um pouco distraída! Viver junto com a charmosa Tokimori-san sempre me deixa nervoso!

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

altTitles.ja: こころすまいるプライスレス

description.en: One of Kokoro’s mask ended up in Kourindou, and to get it back she will have to work for Rinnosuke. But don’t worry, Koishi is here to help.
description.pt: Depois de achar a Máscara na loja Kourindou, Kokoro pede para devolver, mas para isso ela terá que trabalhar para Rinnosuke vendendo objetos junto com ajuda da Koishi.

altTitles.th: จิฮายะ กลอนรักพิชิตใจเธอ

altTitles.ja: ちはやふる

description.en:
Chihaya is a girl in the sixth grade, still not old enough to even know the meaning of the word zeal. But one day, she meets Arata, a transfer student from rural Fukui prefecture. Though docile and quiet, he has an unexpected skill: his ability to play competitive karuta, a traditional Japanese card game. Chihaya is struck by his obsession with the game, along with his ability to pick out the right card and swipe it away before any of his opponents. However, Arata is transfixed by her as well, all because of her unbelievable natural talent for the game. Don't miss the first volume in this story of adolescent lives and emotions playing out in the most dramatic of ways.

---
  
- **Won the 2nd Manga Taisho Award in 2009** 
- **Won the 35th Kodansha Manga Award for Shoujo in 2011**
  


---

**Official Websites:**   
- [Live-Action Movies](http://chihayafuru-movie.com)  
- [Chihayafuru Charity Fund Info](https://chihayafund.com/)  
- [Chihayafuru Charity Fund Store](https://chihayafund.stores.jp/)
description.ja: まだ“情熱”って言葉さえ知らない、小学校６年生の千早(ちはや)。そんな彼女が出会ったのは、福井からやってきた転校生・新(あらた)。おとなしくて無口な新だったが、彼には意外な特技があった。それは、小倉百人一首競技かるた。千早は、誰よりも速く誰よりも夢中に札を払う新の姿に衝撃を受ける。しかし、そんな新を釘付けにしたのは千早のずば抜けた「才能」だった……。まぶしいほどに一途な思いが交差する青春ストーリー、いよいよ開幕!!
description.es-la:
Chihaya, un estudiante de 6º curso de primaria conoce a Arata, un estudiante transferido de Fukui, es un chico dócil y tranquilo pero, tiene una habilidad asombrosamente especial y es en el juego Ogura Hyakunin Isshu Karuta. Chihaya está sorprendida por la forma en que Arata pasa las cartas más rápido que nadie, y por lo absorto que está en el juego más que nadie. Pero, Arata está más embelesado por el inmenso "potencial" de Chihaya. Sus sentimientos se unen de forma radiante en esta historia de juventud.
___
- Ganó el 2º Premio Manga Taisho en 2009. 
- Ganó el 35º Premio Kodansha Manga en la categoría shoujo en 2011.
description.pt-br: Por toda sua vida, o sonho de Chihaya era ver sua irmã se tornar a melhor modelo do Japão... Isso até que o aluno transferido quieto e modesto chamado Arata lhe explica que um sonho é algo que você mesmo deve perseguir. Arata pratica uma versão competitiva do jogo de cartas tradicional Japonês (conhecido como Hyakunin Isshu) de um jeito que Chihaya nunca tinha visto antes. Após substituir Arata em uma partida, Chihaya desperta uma paixão pelo jogo. Agora Chihaya quer se tornar a número um no mundo, a Rainha de Karuta.

altTitles.ja: 婦警さんと暗殺さん

description.en: The assassin with a scary mug has arrived in the town where an air-headed policewoman with a strong sense of justice lives! Although his target is a businessman, his constant flirting with the policewoman is causing him great trouble! The assassin constantly tries to eliminate the businessman who is in love with the policewoman... and if you look closely, there's a possible love triangle ?! Will the day the assassin can complete his job come?
description.ja: 正義感あふれる(天然)婦警さんの住む町へ、コワモテの暗殺さんがやってきた！ターゲットである実業家さんを暗殺しようとするも、お人よしさがジャマをして、うまくいかないことばかり！それを阻止しようとする婦警さん、その婦警さんに恋心を抱く実業家さん……と、気づけば奇妙な三角関係に!? 予想外の展開に振り回されっぱなしの暗殺さんが、仕事をまっとうできる日はいつ!?

altTitles.ja: やぎさん郵便

description.en: University student Hirose Kiyotaka finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. While attempting to return the letter, he encounters the charismatic Hanashiro Seiji and quickly becomes involved with him. As their tentative relationship develops, however, he finds himself wondering how serious Hanashiro's feelings for him really are. Meanwhile, the letter falls into the hands of Hanashiro's colleague Sawa Jinichiro, who entraps its writer, Arihara Mineo. Sawa's actions are seemingly ruthless, but his true motives regarding Arihara are far from clear.

altTitles.ja: IZAYOIすくらんぶる

description.en: It seems Sakuya’s most important possession has gone missing. But she’s quick to take strong measures to retrieve. Maybe too quick and too strong…
description.pt: Sakuya não consegue achar o seu relógio e decide atormentar a Marisa em busca de respostas.

altTitles.ja: マダム・プティ

description.en:
It's the 1920s and Mariko, age 16, is married to a man 30 years her senior. She is honestly happy 
to be his wife and really excited to board the Orient express in Turkey on their honeymoon trip. 
But her life takes a rapid turn when her husband is discovered dead after the first night on board… 
And that's only the start of Mariko's great adventure.

altTitles.ja: 外本ケンセイ夜馬裕

description.en: This horror anthology presents a collection of eerie ghost stories based on real-life accounts gathered over two decades by the renowned storyteller Yama Yuu. Adapted by Hokamoto Kensei, the manga explores the unsettling facets of human nature and madness, as a mysterious young girl narrates the tales within a secluded room. The stories promise a dark, chilling atmosphere that immerses readers in an eerie journey into the supernatural.
description.vi:
Một bộ truyện về những câu chuyện kinh dị của tác giả Yama Yu, một nhà văn chuyên viết truyện ma của Nhật Bản được minh họa bởi Hokamoto Kensei.
Những câu chuyện kinh dị của Yama Yu tiên sinh đi sâu vào chủ nghĩa hiện thực và sự điên rồ của con người dựa trên những câu chuyện ma có thật được thu thập từ khắp Nhật Bản suốt hơn 20 năm.
Và với ngòi bút của họa sĩ Hokamoto Kensei, những câu chuyện méo mó về thứ bóng tối nằm sâu trong trái tim con người sẽ được lột tả một cách chân thực hơn bao giờ hết trong tác phẩm Yếm Đàm Dạ Thoại này.

altTitles.ja: 北欧ふたりぐらし

description.en:
Fuyumi and Taoka are a working couple who have just started dating. When they were all worn out after work, Fuyumi saw a show about Sweden on TV. When Fuyumi saw the relaxed Scandinavian lifestyle, she couldn't help but mutter, "I wish I could live there." Yohei, who had been offered a chance to transfer to Sweden the day before, felt like her words were a stroke of fate, and proposed to her right then.

A sudden change of scenery will lead to a new life of "mysig" in a land of happiness.
description.ja:
ふゆ美と陽平は付き合いたての社会人カップル。

仕事に心をすり減らせる日々の中、「北欧に住みたい」というふゆ美のふとした一言がきっかけで、急転直下で結婚＆スウェーデンに移住をすることに！

幸せの国で始まった二人のmysigな新生活は、驚きとゆとりに満ちていて――♪

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

title.en: I Get Stronger Just by Lying Down While My Apprentice Cultivates

altTitles.zh: 徒弟升级 我躺着就变强

altTitles.zh-ro: Tudi Shengji - Wo Tangzhe Jiu Bian Qiang

altTitles.en: Apprentice Upgrade - I Get Stronger Just By Lying Flat

altTitles.zh: 徒弟升级我躺着就变强

description.en: When my apprentice cultivates, I become stronger— my apprentice's cultivation is returned ten thousand times over, and from then on, I dominate, invincible in heaven and on earth!

altTitles.th: ผู้โดยสารในโลกแฟนตาซี

description.en: A 22-year-old worker, Ren Zheng, reunites with his old friend during graduation season. A moment of light-hearted banter is taken seriously by the god of reincarnation, who sends Ren Zheng and his friend into a fantastical world as part of their graduation. The two are reincarnated as an [Angel] and a [Demon] respectively, and embark on a series of funny and thrilling adventures.
description.zh: 22岁的打工人任郑和自己的老朋友毕业季叙旧，一时的调侃被转生之神信以为真，转世之神将其任郑附带毕业季送往一个奇幻世界，二人分别转生为【天使】和【恶魔】，并且踏上了各种搞笑和刺激冒险故事。

altTitles.en: 不完全で不衛生でふしだら

description.en: The story of Yugami Maiko, a girl with a fetish for teeth, and Hizumi Ryuuji, a guy who hates his teeth.
description.ja:
第24回電撃コミック大賞《金賞》受賞作が連載化！
「歯」に性的興奮を覚える歯科医の娘・湯上麻衣子。彼女に目をつけられた氷住龍司は、なぜか歯磨きをされる日々を送るようになり――。
それは、汚くも美しいボーイ・ミーツ・ガール

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam MSV-R Legend of the Universal Century Heroes: The Fabulous Shin Matsunaga

altTitles.en: Legend of the Universal Century Heroes: Mobile Suit Gundam MSV-R
Mobile Suit Gundam - MSV-R - Fabulous Shin Matsunaga

altTitles.ja-ro: Uchuu Seiki Eiyuu Densetsu - Mobile Suit Gundam MSV-R

altTitles.ja: 宇宙世紀英雄伝説　MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM MSV-R
機動戦士ガンダム MSV-R 宇宙世紀英雄伝説 虹霓のシン・マツナガ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam MSV-R - Uchuu Seiki Eiyuu Densetsu: Kougei no Shin Matsunaga

description.en:
Many heroes have fought through the eras. Soldiers play a sonorous melody, their traces shaping the course of history. Even now, their stories shall be read from a corner of the Pantheon. For those with regrets in their hearts, the battle begins. This is a tale of heroes who fell in space.  
  
I. White Wolf of Rainbows: There was once a man called the White Wolf of Solomon. A man who was even said to be the right hand man of Vice Admiral Dozle Zabi, the commander of the Principality of Zeon’s Space Assault Force. The year 0079 of the Universal Century was a year painted with death and destruction, all in the name of Zeon’s war for independence. So how did that man live through those times? This is the story that traces his paths…

title.en: The Youngest Disciple of the Martial Arts Leader

description.en: The strongest in the martial world, leader of the Hojeongdan, Lee Hwan! During a mission, he battles the Heavenly Demon of the Demonic Sect, Deung Gwang-cheon, and loses consciousness… When he opens his eyes, he’s at home? No… This is my childhood home? It’s hard to believe, but if I really have returned to the past, this time I won’t just stand by and do nothing! On the night of August 8th, when he was 17 years old, a sudden, splitting headache strikes, and something comes to mind. “Cheonsu Ilgi Hap (Thousand Hands One Energy Unification), Deukwon Gang (Obtain Original Strength)…” He muttered absentmindedly and then paused. “Wait, this is the Absolute Demonic Art of the Heavenly Demon! How do I know this technique? Am I going crazy?!”

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal~〈Fan Colored〉

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

description.en: Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

Lu Wang Xin is the young miss of Yun Jian Mountain Villa. She fell in love with Xia Hou You. However, after Xia Hou You ascended the throne, he put Lu Wang Xin into the Cold Palace. Heartbroken, Lu Wang Xin died. Reborn at age 16, Lu Wang Xin embarked on the road of revenge…

title.en: Kirby of the Stars: Daily Round Diary!

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoshi no Kirby - Kyou mo Manmaru Nikki!

altTitles.ja: 星のカービィ 今日もまんまる日記！

description.en: He's pink and round! He's a glutton! A new manga series about Kirby, the airheaded but irresistible hero of the video game world! Lots of copy abilities are here! Plus, the familiar members such as King Dedede, Waddle Dee, and Meta Knight, as well as such and such characters from previous Kirby titles, are all gathered together! The definitive version of the hilarious Kirby manga!

altTitles.ja: (C69) ワーニング ギバウス ムーン (東方Project)

description.en: The story of how a wandering "slashing demon" was inducted into service at the Scarlet Devil Mansion.

altTitles.ja: エンバーズ

description.en: A bad apple finds a new way to fight on the soccer field!

title.en: Touhou - To Aru Kouma no Medamayaki!! (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Touhou dj - A Certain Scarlet Devil’s Sunny-Side-Up Eggs!!
Touhou dj - To Aru Kouma no Medamayaki!!
とある紅魔の目玉焼き!!

description.en:
SDM starts their day with an explosion. Flandre said she was cooking, as for why the kitchen is destroyed. it because Marisa said "Cooking is power" to Flan. Now, Meiling is teaching Flan how to cook correctly.  
  
Part of [Touhou](https://mangadex.org/?page=search&title=touho) series.

altTitles.ja: 罪と罰のスピカ

altTitles.vi: Spica, Hình Phạt và Tội Ác

description.en: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.
description.ja: 最も無垢で、最も罪深い。世界はこんなヒロインを待っていたーー。
description.vi:
Câu chuyện xoay quanh Hatori, một giáo viên tại trường cấp 3 và là người có cuộc sống rất đỗi bình thường. Một ngày nọ, anh nhận ra rằng học sinh mà mình chủ nhiệm, Tsumugi Spica đang bị bạn cùng lớp bắt nạt.
Những tưởng đây chỉ là một cô bé nhút nhát, nhưng...

altTitles.tr: Gençliklerini geri kazanan büyükbaba ve büyükanne hakkında hikaye

altTitles.en: A Story About a Grandpa and Grandma Who Returned Back to Their Youth

altTitles.id: Sebuah Kisah Tentang Kakek dan Nenek yang Kembali Ke Masa Mudanya.

altTitles.ru: История о Дедушке и Бабушке, которые снова стали молодыми

altTitles.uk: Історія про дідуся з бабусею, що знову стали молодими

altTitles.ja: おじいさんとおばあさんが若返った話。
じいさんばあさん若返る

altTitles.es-la: Un Abuelo y Una Abuela que Regresaron a su Juventud

altTitles.ja-ro: Ojii-san to Obaa-san ga Wakigaetta Hanashi

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre um vovô e uma vovó que voltaram à juventude

altTitles.ja: Jiisan Baasan Wakagaeru

description.en: This story is about Ine and Shouzou, two pensioners well into their 80s who are mysteriously returned to their 20s one night.
description.es:
Shozo e Ine son una pareja de ancianos que dirigen una granja de manzanas en Aomori. Un día se despiertan y descubren que se han transformado en sus yo más jóvenes. El apuesto abuelo y la bella abuela se meten en líos.
Una comedia sobre una pareja bulliciosa y cariñosa, ¡en la que participan un apuesto abuelo y una hermosa abuela!
description.ja:
青森でリンゴ農家を営む老夫婦・正蔵とイネ。
ある日目覚めるとふたりは若い頃の姿になっていて！？
イケメンなじいさま＆美人なばあさまが巻き起こす、
お騒がせおしどり夫婦コメディ！
description.es-la:
Shozo e Ine son una pareja de ancianos que dirigen una granja de manzanas en Aomori. Un día se despiertan y descubren que se han transformado en sus yo más jóvenes. El apuesto abuelo y la bella abuela se meten en líos.
Una comedia sobre una pareja bulliciosa y cariñosa, ¡en la que participan un apuesto abuelo y una hermosa abuela!
description.pt-br: História sobre Ine e Shouzou, dois aposentados com mais de 80 anos que misteriosamente voltaram aos 20 anos uma noite.

description.en:
From Webtoon: A high school girl who rises to pretty girl fame in her school after she masters the art of make-up via YouTube.  
From Naver: Everyone has a secret. Then what kind of secret does a goddess have?
description.pt-br:
Depois de assistir a vídeos de beleza on-line, uma fã tímida de quadrinhos domina a arte da maquiagem e vê seu status social subir rapidamente quando ela se torna a garota mais bonita da escola literalmente da noite para o dia.

Mas seu status de elite terá vida curta? Quanto tempo ela pode manter seu "eu verdadeiro" em segredo?

E o garoto fofo que ela gosta? Você poderia imaginar se ele descobrisse a verdade?

description.en: This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん
Саша и ее одноклассник Отаку

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

title.en: It Turns out That I Have Been Invincible for a Long Time

altTitles.en: I've Been Invincible for a Long Time

altTitles.vi: Hoá Ra Ta Đã Vô Địch Từ Lâu

altTitles.ja: 才能ゼロが無敵になったわけ

description.en: Over a five-year journey around the world, Ye Changqing first believed he could be like other cool novel protagonist systems with a plug-in, but even the most common immortal cultivator cannot be. Living close to a sect in a small town was his only option, so he started a business. His small store eventually turned into the holy land of all the righteous individuals, and the dog he raised up turned out to be the feared demon king. From that moment on, everyone acknowledged Ye Changqing as a Supreme Master.

altTitles.ja: 逃げ上手の若君

description.en: Yusei Matsui, creator of Assassination Classroom and Neuro: Supernatural Detective, is back! Set in feudal Japan in between the Kamakura and Muromachi periods, our hero Hojo Takatoki is a boy on the run that history all but forgot! When the Kamakura shogunate is overthrown by Ashikaga Takauji, Takatoki's family and standing are visciously taken away from him, and he must flee to the far reaches of the land to survive and seek out his revenge!
description.ru: Действие происходит в феодальной Японии между периодами Камакура и Муромати, наш герой Ходзе Такатоки - мальчик в бегах, о котором история почти забыла! Когда сегунат Камакура свергнут Асикагой Такаудзи, семья и положение Такатоки насильно отнимаются у него, и он должен бежать в дальние края страны, чтобы выжить и отомстить!

altTitles.ja: ザハの恋

description.en: As the vampire Zach nears the end of his search for his lost love, he finds himself looking upon an old house in the middle of a quiet Japanese town. In it reside 3 people — an old lady and her granddaughters. Despite sharing neither their lifespan nor their sense of values, he decides to live with them. And as time goes by, he learns what it means to be human, leafing through the stories in the life of the woman he holds dear.

title.en: Musuko ga Kawaikute Shikataganai Mazoku no Hahaoya

altTitles.en: Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!

altTitles.es-la: La madre demonio indefensa frente a la lindura de su hijo

altTitles.zh: 儿子可爱过头的魔族母亲

altTitles.ja: 息子がかわいくて仕方がない魔族の母親

altTitles.ko: 아들이 귀여워서 어쩔 수 없는 마족엄마

altTitles.tr: Oğlunun Tatlılığına Karşı Koyamayan Bir Şeytan Anne

description.en:
Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.

For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.

Feel the Love in it!
description.tr: Bir iblisin kötü günlerini arkada bırakarak, anne olma yolundaki adımlarını anlatan sevimli bir seri.
description.pt-br:
Lorem, uma demônio infame e temível, teve que se estabelecer por causa de Gospel, seu filho. Embora não pareça, ela é uma mãe amorosa e zelosa, mas permanece temível tanto para os companheiros demônios quanto para os espectadores humanos, porque mantém a terrível reputação de sua juventude selvagem e terrível dos anos anteriores.

Pelo bem do amor maternal, ela tem que perseverar, aprender e prosperar num mundo onde não está sozinha. Pelo bem do Evangelho e do seu futuro.

Sinta o Amor nele!

title.en: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi o Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai o Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族、鑑定スキルで成り上がる～弱小領地を受け継いだので、優秀な人材を増やしていたら、最強領地になってた～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi wo Uketsuidanode, Yuushuuna Jinzai wo Fuyashite Itara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.en: As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I'll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World: I Inherited a Weak Territory, and If I Increase the Number of Capable Personnel, It Will Become the Strongest Territory

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族，以鑑定技能成名～因為繼承了弱小的領地，所以如果增加了優秀的人才，就會成為最強的領地～

altTitles.id: Terlahir kembali menjadi seorang bangsawan dengan skill penilaian
Seorang bangsawan yang bereinkarnasi, bangkit dengan kemampuan analisis

altTitles.pt-br: Como um Aristocrata Reencarnado, Usarei Minha Habilidade de Avaliação para Subir no Mundo

altTitles.vi: Quý Tộc Tái Sinh Thăng Tiến Nhờ Kỹ Năng Thẩm Định: Vì Thừa Kế Một Lãnh Địa Nhỏ Yếu, Nên Khi Tuyển Dụng Người Tài, Đã Trở Thành Lãnh Địa Mạnh Nhất
Tái Sinh Thành Quý Tộc Với Kĩ Năng "Thẩm Định"

description.en: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
description.ja: 転生し、弱小貴族として異世界を生きることになったアルス・ローベント。現代同様、異世界でも体力・知力ともに平凡だったが、“鑑定スキル”という人の潜在能力を知ることが出来るスキルを生まれつき所持していた。アルスは自分の民たちを守るため、“鑑定スキル”で弱小領地を最強の領地へと変貌させていく───！
description.vi: Sau khi được tái sinh, Ars Louvent được cho là một quý tộc yếu kém. Cả sức mạnh thể chất và trí tuệ của cậu đều ở mức trung bình ở cả 2 thế giới. Nhưng cậu sở hữu một kĩ năng độc nhất có tên ' Thẩm định' cho phép cậu có thể nhìn được chỉ số và tiềm năng của mọi người. Bằng cách tập hợp những người tài năng về bên cạnh, Ars sẽ sử dụng kĩ năng 'Thẩm định' này để khiến lãnh thổ yếu ớt của mình thành nơi mạnh nhất! Nhưng con đường phía trước của cậu sẽ không hề dễ dàng.
description.pt-br: Após ser reencarnado, Ars Louvent deve viver em um mundo diferente como um aristocrata fraco. Tanto sua força física quanto sua inteligência eram medíocres em ambos os mundos, mas aqui ele naturalmente possuía uma habilidade chamada “Avaliação” que lhe permitia ver o potencial de qualquer pessoa. Ao reunir pessoas talentosas ao seu lado, Ars usa esta habilidade de “Avaliação” para transformar seu território fraco no mais forte! Mas o caminho à sua frente não será tão simples.

description.en: Yoon Seol-young faces a harsh reality: a cheating boyfriend of three years, a forced blind date with a divorced man ten years her senior, and the burden of financially supporting her suffocating family. Just when she wishes to escape her stifling life, Ki Tae-hwan, the executive director of Shinhwa Group, rumored to be gay due to his excessively clean private life, approaches her with a proposal: "Let's get married. I'll take you to a higher place." Overnight, Seol-young goes from being the secretary in the executive director's office to becoming his daughter-in-law. But what is the true purpose behind Tae-hwan's marriage proposal?

title.en: Restarting the Life of the Loser Princess

altTitles.fr: Recommencer la vie de la princesse perdante

description.en:
Her Royal Highness the Princess became the Queen somehow...
Her Royal Highness the Princess was beheaded for no apparent reason...
Her Royal Highness the Princess was inexplicably reborn as a 6-year-old...
Her Royal Highness the Princess Level 999...
This time Her Royal Highness is going to kill everyone!
Who said that only heroes can restart their lives? ! 

Adapted From : 廢柴公主LV999 (Wasteful Princess Level 999)
description.fr:
Son Altesse Royale la Princesse est devenue la Reine inexplicablement...
Son Altesse Royale la Princesse a été guillotinée pour aucune raison apparente...
Son Altesse Royale la Princesse a été de façon inexpliqué réincarné à ses 6 ans...
Son Altesse Royale la Princesse Niveau 999...
Cette fois ci son altesse royale va tuer tout le monde!
Qui a dit que seuls les héros peuvent recommencer leurs vie? ! 

adapté de : 廢柴公主LV999 (Princesse gaspilleuse Niveau 999)
description.zh:
公主殿下莫名其妙當了女皇…… 
公主殿下莫名其妙被斬首…… 
公主殿下莫名其妙重生回了6歲……
 公主殿下Lv999…… 
這次公主殿下要大殺四方！
誰說只有勇者才能重啓人生的？！
 改編自：廢柴公主LV999

altTitles.ja: Haisu Koa Gaaru Dasshu
Hi Score Girl DASH
ハイスコアガールDASH

description.en: The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka, who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.
description.es-la: Año 2007, Hidaka Koharu ahora es maestra de secundaria y a punto de alcanzar los 30 años. Sin novio y sin perspectivas para el futuro. Balanceándose entre el trabajo y la búsqueda de matrimonio, el corazón de esta chica madura es como un Kikouken.

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

title.en: The Male Lead Is Trying to Change the Female Lead

altTitles.en: The Hero Is Trying to Change the Heroine

altTitles.fr: Le principal masculin essaie de changer la principale féminin
Le héros essaie de changer la heroïne

altTitles.es: ¿El protagonista masculino está tratando de cambiar a la protagonista femenina?

altTitles.ja: 脇役のはずが、主人公に求婚されています

description.en:
I ended up possessing the body of an extra named Luberia, who is barely mentioned in the story. And right in the tragic novel *Emperor Caesar*, full of wars and disasters, where the protagonist sacrifices everything for the love of the hero and everyone ends up dying! I planned to live discreetly and hide my strength... 

But the male lead, Caesar, keeps looking for me and even proposes marriage, saying he wants to keep me around. Luberia doesn't want to meet the same tragic end as the protagonist, so she tries to avoid Caesar at all costs... But due to Caesar's intimidating appearance and assertiveness, before she knows it, she ends up engaged to him. 

Will Luberia manage not to fall in love with Caesar and survive until the end?
description.es: Quedé poseída por la extra 'Ruberia' cuyo nombre apenas se mencionaba. ¡Por qué, en la empobrecida novela <César se convierte en Emperador>, que está llena de guerras y accidentes, y donde la protagonista femenina se sacrifica por el protagonista masculino y todos mueren! Había planeado ocultar mis fuerzas y vivir en silencio y en silencio... El protagonista masculino, "César", sigue visitando a Ruberia e incluso le pide que se case con él, diciendo que quiere mantenerla a su lado.

description.en:
A lonely girl finds solace in her bag full of memories; now it's time for her to break through her shell.
